bwwExcerpt: The show rests and falls on Feldstein, who must posses as Brice both a grand confidence - "I'm the greatest star" - and an insecurity ("You mean it?"). Brice is a beacon for all the misfits, a stand-in for the unconventional - "a bagel on a plate full of onion rolls" - and Feldstein nails it. Plus, she can deliver a "fakachta" with authenticity. Highlights include a hysterically seductive and hungry "You Are Woman, I Am Man;" a crowded celebration of married life in "Sadie, Sadie;" the touching
